level.heading: Residency preference.
level.text: The provisions of § 1-608.01(e)(1), (2), (3), (5), (6), and (7) shall apply to employment in the Management Supervisory Service.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-124, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-603.01.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Applicability of § 101(k) of D.C. Law 12-124: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-609.51.
